ygData.subject: Re: Important! Everyone read!...
ygData.msgSnippet: You re serioustly pushing it, SoulStice. Be sure you understand the rule before you try to support your side with it. This does not mean you can fire 25 shots

Subject: Re: Important! Everyone read!...

X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 110
From: Yanshosh@...

You're serioustly pushing it, SoulStice. Be sure you understand the rule 
before you try to support your side with it.

"This does not mean you can fire 25 shots from a machine gun, put that down, 
fire 4 shots from a normal gun, put that down, etc..."

By that, I mean that you can't keep taking out new guns. Dropping a gun and 
pulling another one out once isn't against the rules, doing it 5 times or so 
is.

And, if you reread KSL's posts, you'll see that he didn't switch weapons in 
one post, he had both of them out (the only case I remember when he shot from 
two guns was Nemesis from a machine gun and optic lasers). That's the same as 
having two guns in two hands. And its completely identical to what Jetstorm 
fired, only on a smaller scale.

Any replies to this can be sent to me over private email. Further clogging of 
the RPG mails about this argument will result in IMMEDIATE moderation. I am 
not kidding.

(SoulStice, I've been giving you waaay too many second chances, after asking 
you to shut up about it, but this is it. One more RPG mail on this subject, 
and you're getting moderated.)
